# maximumLinearExposure

**Instance Property**

The maximum exposure to apply to a color when returned by the color well.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var maximumLinearExposure: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Configuring color picker attributes

- **title**: The title for the color picker.
- **supportsAlpha**: A Boolean value that determines whether the color picker supports alpha values.
- **supportsEyedropper**: If set to `NO` the eyedropper functionality is not supported for this color well.
- **selectedColor**: The selected color in the color picker.
